A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I would never miss the latest Star Wars\, though the narrative is again the same. This one has beautiful scenery and space fights interrupted by self-conscious speeches\, making for an overly long flick. I like the new\, young heroes and sensitive villain\, and already look forward to the next installment. This is not a redefining SW experience\, however\, and increasingly feels like the video game tie-in they showed as trailer. Next\, do it yourself Star Wars.
